summary:
Motivator, Sales talent, People Manager, Flexible, no 9 till 5 mentality.

10 Years Experience in a CS Contactcentre, 
5 Years  Experience in the Employment Agency Bussiness,
2 Years Experience in Office (Back/Front) Management,

The best environment for me to work in is a Company that achieves the best of results through honesty, treating colleagues equally and respect for eachother.

Specialties: Werven & selecteren van hoog opgeleid personeel, ontwikkelen sales vaardigheden, coachen/opleiden van Contact Center medewerkers.

profile_positions.title: Sr. Teammanager CAK/WTCG Trainer CAK/CER - WTCG Trainer KPN SAVE

company.name: Op zoek naar een leuke baan

profile_positions.company: Op zoek naar een leuke baan
profile_positions.title: Supervisor, Office manager

profile_positions.description:
- projectmanagement,
- responsible for placing personel, welders – high educated engineers,
- responsible within projects, from documentation/Office management,
- structure invoices and correspondence National/International (Germany – France – England)
- timesheets,
- correspondence in German, France and English,
- organise business-trips, workshops, events, lunch/dinner,
- buyer Officesupplies and projectstops for Shell, Esso, Exxon Mobil,
- manage Office stock,
- manage mailbox, appointments for Director,
- organise events,
- develope and carrie out presentations in PowerPoint,
- coordinate and carrie out commercial training,
- receive customers,
- 1st contactperson for Reintgrationbureaus as Werkgeversservicepunt and Aijer,
- coordinate incentives for clients/personel,
- also all of the above for Stichting prof. Steenkampfonds (CDA)
- coordinate correspondence and all the other administrative tasks for Director as teacher at Nyenrode
- coordinate correspondence and all the other administrative tasks for Director as memeber of VRC (Vereniging van Registercontrollers)
- coordinate correspondence and all the other administrative tasks for Director as President RVC Rabobank (Raad van Commissarissen)
profile_positions.title: Office manager

profile_positions.description:
- lead, motivate the 4 Customer Service Teamleaders, 1 ass. Teamleader and 52 C.S. 
  representatives, 
- in and extern meetings,
- educate own personnel in different tasks, inbound etc.
- recruit and select personnel,
- built registration of hours in Excel, building systems and maintenance these in Word,
- responsible for structure within the company, 
- roster coordinator,
- responsible for the timesheets, delegate tasks, control the tasks of personnel,
- guard service levels, rapports and quality, through own rapports system,
- report to Director,
- administrative tasks,
- innovate and implement telephone scripts, evaluation/function and enquire forms, 
   prepare and train Customer Service Representatives.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Supervisor CS

profile_positions.description:

  guard service-levels and quality-results and report to Region-Director,

- working with company computer systems,
- calculate salary of temporary employees in computersystem,
- innovate and implement telephone scripts, evaluation/function and enquire forms, 
  prepare and train Consultants,
- all further administrative tasks related to the job.
